line-9: This role reports directly to the Head of Sourcing TRU and the core procurement team is based in the York office which requires close collaboration with the customer and correspondingly you will be required to work 3 days in the Leeds office. To succeed, you will need significant knowledge and experience related to managing complex and high value commercial and procurement activities in a public sector environment under the Utility Contract Regulations.  You will work closely with senior stakeholders within TRU and deliver comprehensive procurement and contract management support from the strategic planning of complex procurement activities through to contract delivery.  Whilst the main focus of this role is sourcing activity this has the potential to evolve over time.
